title.en: Essence of All the Buddhas of Past, Present and Future

text.en: Essence of all the buddhas of past, present and future, precious guru, watch over me.
text.en-trans: dü sum sangye tamché kyi ngowo lama rinpoche khyen no

text.en: Inspire my mind with your blessings, I pray.
text.en-trans: dak gi gyü jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that my mind may turn towards the Dharma.
text.en-trans: lo chö su drowar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that Dharma may progress along the path.
text.en-trans: chö lam du drowar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that the path may overcome delusion.
text.en-trans: lam trulwar zhikpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that deluded perception may dawn as wisdom.
text.en-trans: trulnang yeshe su charwar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that all non-dharmic thoughts may cease.
text.en-trans: chö min namtok gakpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray, so that day and night may be dedicated to Dharma.
text.en-trans: nyintsen chö la dawar jingyi lab tu sol
